title: Talking Watchface
summary: Android wear app that speaks time & includes Beautiful collection of watch faces
description: Android wear app with a great collection of beautiful faces and includes a unique feature of announcing time every hour and on double tap.**** Pls Note - This feature will only work on watches that have in-built speaker ****The unique features of the app are:- Announces time every hour from 8 am to 8 pm- Announces time on double tap on watch.- Collection of Beautiful images to choose from as Watchface- Analog and Digital dials available
descriptionHTML:
Android wear app with a great collection of beautiful faces and includes a unique feature of announcing time every hour and on double tap.

**** Pls Note - This feature will only work on watches that have in-built speaker ****

The unique features of the app are:

- Announces time every hour from 8 am to 8 pm
- Announces time on double tap on watch.
- Collection of Beautiful images to choose from as Watchface
- Analog and Digital dials available
comments: They have finally fixed the issue I reported.i can put my own pictures on watch face straight away.thank you.great app
